LanguageData.AteRawFood.label: Ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFood.description: I had to eat raw food. Can't we cook it, or at least synthesize some nutrient paste?
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.label: Ate nutrient paste
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.description: I had to eat nutrient paste. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.label: Ate fine meal
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.label: Ate lavish meal
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
LanguageData.AteHumanoidMeatDirect.label: Raw cannibalism
LanguageData.AteHumanoidMeatDirect.description: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.
LanguageData.AteHumanoidMeatAsIngredient.label: Cooked cannibalism
LanguageData.AteHumanoidMeatAsIngredient.description: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanoidCorpse.label: Butchered humanoid
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanoidCorpse.description: I just butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.label: Observed corpse
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.description: I saw a dead body laying on the ground.
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageEmpty.label: Observed empty gibbet cage
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageEmpty.description: Those gibbet cages look so cruel.
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageFullStranger.label: Observed dead stranger in gibbet cage
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageFullStranger.descripti: I saw a dead stranger on display in a gibbet cage. What a cruel place.
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageFullColonist.label: Observed dead colonist in gibbet cage
LanguageData.ObservedGibbetCageFullColonist.descripti: I saw one of our own dead in the gibbet cage. I've talked to that person. This place is terrifying.
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.label: New colony optimism
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.description: We just landed here. It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.label: New colony hope
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.description: I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...
LanguageData.SleptOutside.label: Slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutside.description: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.label: Slept on ground
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.description: I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.
LanguageData.BattleWounded.label: Wounded
LanguageData.BattleWounded.description: That's my blood! I've been wounded in a fight!
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerBeaten.label: A prisoner was beaten
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.label: A prisoner was sold
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.description: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerExecuted.label: A prisoner was executed
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerExecuted.description: A prisoner was executed in cold blood. This colony seems more evil by the day.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeath.label: Witnessed someone's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeath.description: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.PrisonerFriendlyChat.label: Convinced by warden
LanguageData.PrisonerFriendlyChat.description: That warden and I had a talk about the colony. It sounds like a good place...
LanguageData.PrisonerBeatenMild.label: Beaten by warden
LanguageData.PrisonerBeatenMild.description: That warden just beat me up. He didn't break anything but, damn, it hurts.
LanguageData.PrisonerBeatenVicious.label: Beaten viciously by warden
LanguageData.PrisonerBeatenVicious.description: That warden just beat the hell from me. I could die from this...
LanguageData.SocialTalk.label: Had social chat
LanguageData.SocialTalk.description: I just had a good chat with someone.
